geninfo.para: A new pushrod assembly 1837730C2 replaces pushrod 1837730C1.
Ball ends on the new pushrod assembly are made from the same material. The new pushrod can be installed with either end up.

note.para: Ball ends on push rod 1837730C1 are made from two different materials; this pushrod must be installed with the copper colored end up.

svcproc.title: Procedure
svcproc.para: See procedures in one of the following engine manuals for removal and installation of pushrod assemblies.

item.para: International® VT 275 Engine Diagnostic Manual EGES-305
International® VT 365 Engine Diagnostic Manual EGES-235-1 (2002/2003 MY)
International® VT 365 Engine Diagnostic Manual EGES-295 (2004 MY)
